name: Financial Close and Contract Signing
remarks: All financing agreements executed. Consortium equity committed.

name: Land Acquisition and Resettlement
remarks: Delayed by 15 days due to compensation negotiations. All families resettled.

name: Site Mobilization and Camps Establishment
remarks: Four work camps established along the route. Equipment deployed.

name: Section 1 Earthworks (Lusaka-Kabwe)
remarks: Earthworks progressing. 68km of 150km completed.

name: Section 2 Earthworks (Kabwe-Kapiri Mposhi)
remarks: Work commenced January 2025. On schedule.

name: Bridge Construction - Lunsemfwa River
remarks: Foundation work initiated. Major span design approved.

name: Toll Plaza Systems Installation
remarks: Site locations finalized. Procurement of toll systems underway.

name: Final Road Completion and Opening
remarks: Scheduled for mid-2029 completion.

name: Financial Close
remarks: IDA credit agreement signed. Consortium equity committed.

name: Site Mobilization and Demolition
remarks: Old structures demolished. Site prepared for construction.

name: Foundation and Basement Works
remarks: Basement level 2 completed. Level 1 walls in progress.

name: Main Hospital Building Structure
remarks: 3 floors of 8-story building completed.

name: Medical Equipment Installation
remarks: Equipment procurement initiated. Siemens contract signed.

name: Hospital Commissioning and Handover
remarks: Scheduled for August 2027.

name: Financial Close
remarks: AfDB loan agreement signed.

name: Site Mobilization
remarks: Equipment and personnel mobilized ahead of schedule.

name: Treatment Plant Civil Works
remarks: Clarifier tanks 80% complete. Filter beds 50% complete.

name: Mechanical and Electrical Installation
remarks: Pumps and motors procurement completed. Installation ongoing.

name: Commissioning and Trial Operation
remarks: Scheduled for Q1 2027.

name: Financial Close
verifiedBy: PPP Unit / Airports Company South Africa
remarks: All financing in place. Construction commenced.

name: Terminal Building Expansion Phase 1
remarks: Departures hall expansion completed and operational.

name: Runway Extension and Strengthening
remarks: Runway extended by 400m. Strengthening work ongoing.

name: Cargo Terminal Construction
remarks: Structural works 60% complete. Refrigerated storage installed.

name: Full Airport Commissioning
remarks: On track for Q4 2026 completion.
